verses.verse: And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Command<WH6680> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH7133>, My offering, and my bread<WH3899> for my sacrifices made by fire<WH801>, for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto me<WH8104>, shall you observe to offer<WH7126> unto me in their due season<WH4150>.

And you shall say<WH559> unto them<WH801>, This is the offering made by fire which you shall offer<WH7126> unto the Lord<WH3068>; two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without spot<WH8549> day by day<WH3117>, for a continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>.
The one<WH259> lamb<WH3532> shall you offer<WH6213> in the morning<WH1242>, and the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> shall you offer<WH6213> at even<WH6153>;
And a tenth<WH6224> part of an ephah<WH374> of flour<WH5560> for a food offering<WH4503>, mingled<WH1101> with the fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969> of beaten<WH3795> oil<WH8081>.

It is a continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, which was ordained<WH6213> in mountain<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514> for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381>, a sacrifice made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And the drink offering<WH5262> there shall be the fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969> for the one<WH259> lamb<WH3532>: in the holy<WH6944> place shall you cause the strong wine<WH7941> to be poured<WH5258> unto the Lord<WH3068> for a drink offering<WH5262>.

And the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> shall you offer<WH6213> at evening<WH6153>: as the food offering<WH4503> of the morning<WH1242>, and as the drink offering<WH5262> there<WH6213>, you shall offer it<WH801>, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And on the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without spot<WH8549>, and two<WH8147> tenth<WH6241> deals of flour<WH5560> for a food offering<WH4503>, mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, and the drink offering there<WH5262>:
This is the burnt offering<WH5930> of every sabbath<WH7676>, beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.

And in the beginnings<WH7218> of your months<WH2320> you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the Lord<WH3068>; two<WH8147> young<WH1241> bullocks<WH6499>, and one<WH259> ram<WH352>, seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without spot<WH8549>;

And three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> of flour<WH5560> for a food offering<WH4503>, mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, for one<WH259> bullock<WH6499>; and two<WH8147> tenth<WH6241> deals of flour<WH5560> for a food offering<WH4503>, mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, for one<WH259> ram<WH352>;

And a several tenth deal<WH6241> of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a food offering<WH4503> unto one<WH259> lamb<WH3532>; for a burnt offering<WH5930> of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381>, a sacrifice made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And their drink offerings<WH5262> shall be half<WH2677> an hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196> unto a bullock<WH6499>, and the third<WH7992> part of an hin<WH1969> unto a ram<WH352>, and a fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969> unto a lamb<WH3532>: this is the burnt offering<WH5930> of every month<WH2320> throughout the months<WH2320> of the year<WH8141>.

And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403> unto the Lord<WH3068> shall be offered<WH6213>, beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
And in the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> is the passover<WH6453> of the Lord<WH3068>.
And in the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of this month<WH2320> is the feast<WH2282>: seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shall unleavened bread<WH4682> be eaten<WH398>.
In the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> shall be an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; you shall do<WH6213> no manner of servile<WH5656> work in it<WH4399>:

But you shall offer<WH7126> a sacrifice made by fire<WH801> for a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the Lord<WH3068>; two<WH8147> young<WH1241> bullocks<WH6499>, and one<WH259> ram<WH352>, and seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141>: they shall be unto you without blemish<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>: three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> shall you offer<WH6213> for a bullock<WH6499>, and two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> for a ram<WH352>;
A several tenth deal<WH6241> shall you offer<WH6213> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532>, throughout the seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>:
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering<WH2403>, to make an atonement for you<WH3722>.
You shall offer<WH6213> these beside the burnt offering<WH5930> in the morning<WH1242>, which is for a continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>.

After this manner you shall offer<WH6213> daily<WH3117>, throughout the seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, the food<WH3899> of the sacrifice made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>: it shall be offered<WH6213> beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
And on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> you shall have an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>.

Also in the day<WH3117> of the firstfruits<WH1061>, when you bring<WH7126> a new<WH2319> food offering<WH4503> unto the Lord<WH3068>, after your weeks<WH7620> be out<WH6944>, you shall have an holy convocation<WH4744>; you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>:

But you shall offer<WH7126> the burnt offering<WH5930> for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>; two<WH8147> young<WH1241> bullocks<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141>;

And their food offering<WH4503> of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> unto one<WH259> bullock<WH6499>, two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> unto one<WH259> ram<WH352>,
A several tenth deal<WH6241> unto one<WH259> lamb<WH3532>, throughout the seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>;
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795>, to make an atonement for you<WH3722>.
You shall offer<WH6213> them beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his food offering<WH4503>, (they shall be unto you outside blemish<WH8549>) and their drink offerings<WH5262>.
